Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    io.micronaut.http.annotation.HttpMethodMapping.DEFAULT_URI
    Use UriMapping.DEFAULT_URI instead
    io.micronaut.views.ViewsRenderer.FILE_SEPARATOR
    Use File.separator directly
    io.micronaut.web.router.DefaultRouteBuilder.HYPHENATED_NAMING_STRATEGY
    Dynamic naming conventions are no longer supported
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    io.micronaut.configuration.ribbon.AbstractRibbonClientConfig.getProperty(IClientConfigKey)
    io.micronaut.configuration.ribbon.AbstractRibbonClientConfig.getProperty(IClientConfigKey, Object)
    io.micronaut.spring.core.env.PropertyResolverAdapter.getPropertyAsClass(String, Class<T>)
    io.micronaut.cli.util.NameUtils.isGetter(String, Class<?>[])
    use NameUtils.isGetter(String, Class, Class[]) instead because this method has a defect for "is.." method with Boolean return types.
    io.micronaut.configuration.ribbon.AbstractRibbonClientConfig.setProperty(IClientConfigKey, Object)
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    io.micronaut.discovery.eureka.EurekaConfiguration.EurekaRegistrationConfiguration(EmbeddedServer, ApplicationConfiguration, String, DataCenterInfo)
    Use #EurekaConfiguration(EurekaConnectionPoolConfiguration, ApplicationConfiguration, EurekaRegistrationConfiguration) instead
